summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 17 October to end of Monday 18 October GMT
description: A largely cloudy day for Sunday with a southerly breeze developing. With air arriving in  Greater London from rural regions of France, there'll be little imported pollution allied with good dispersion of local emissions.<br/><br/>Broadly similar conditions are expected to continue during Monday, again with little import and good local dispersion.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
